name: CoQ-10 Toner

description.smallDes: Aloe Vera and Hyaluronic acid provide added hydration and help balance the skin's pH level. Skin feels brighter, tighter and generally much perkier after use.
description.largeDes: This is the ultimate skin quencher for complexions that often feel tight and uncomfortably dry. It’s good for those with ageing concerns, as its star ingredient - CoQ-10 - works to boost the skin’s natural repair and defence mechanisms for a smoother complexion over time. It also contains hyaluronic acid (an impressive humectant), which works to help the skin retain much-needed moisture, while soothing aloe vera, chamomile and cucumber keep skin calm and contented. Think of this as a skin-softening precursor to your serum or moisturiser.

howTo: After cleansing, saturate a cotton pad with formula and gently apply all over face and throat, avoiding the eye area. Follow with moisturiser.

name: HEROINE Mandelic and Licorice Superfood Glow Toner

description.smallDes: This toner gets your pores gleaming with AHAs and botanical extracts, brightens skin tone, calms irritation and blemishes, as well as replenishes moisture.
description.largeDes: An exfoliating toner. This toner will be the hero (or heroine) for your skin. Designed to reduce blemishes, refine pores, and enhance your glow, the HEROINE Mandelic and Licorice Superfood Glow Toner uses 6% mandelic and lactic acid, niacinamide, licorice root and botanical extracts to make pores appear tighter and clearer. Perfect for brightening the complexion, calming irritation and replenishing moisture, this toner needs to make an appearance in your routine.

howTo: After cleansing or exfoliating, gently sweep the toner across your face and neck using a cotton pad. Follow with your usual moisturiser, serum or cream. Suitable for use as part of your morning and evening routine

name: Snow Mushroom Moisturiser

description.smallDes: This super-hydrating, lightweight jelly moisturizer helps to soothe, calm and reduce the appearance of redness, while providing an instant cooling effect on the skin
description.largeDes: Discover the boundless benefits of the beauty world’s latest buzz skincare ingredient with The INKEY List’s Snow Mushroom Moisturiser; a multitasking face lotion that deeply hydrates while providing soothing anti-inflammatory properties and promoting collagen production for a cushiony, dewy, glowing complexion. In synergy with a 2% concentration amino acid-based humectant, the formula is supercharged with Snow Mushroom (or Tremella Fuciformis), a jelly-like fungus that has been used in Chinese medicines and skincare for millennia. Its gelatinous structure, combined with high levels of polysaccharide molecules, act similarly to Hyaluronic acid, by binding moisture to the skin, but has the capacity to penetrate even deeper thanks to its smaller molecular structure. Enriched with Madecassoside, an active ingredient derived from the Centella Asiatica plant, offers anti-itching and anti-irritation powers to calm redness and sensitivities.

howTo: Use AM and PM. Apply a pea-sized amount to face and neck. Apply preferred serums prior to use.

name: Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence

description.smallDes: Absorbing almost instantly to hydrate, soothe and moisturise - perfect when your skin is in need of a little pick-me-up
description.largeDes: This COSRX Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence comprises 96% of skin friendly snail secretion filtrate that is effective at repairing damaged skin, improving skin elasticity and maintaining hydration level all day long. It only contains essential ingredients, that nourish, repair and revitalise the skin.

howTo: After cleansing and toning, and before moisturiser, apply a small amount to a damp face. Press remaining residue in with your fingertips to aid absorption.

name: Cream to Foam Cleanser
ingredientList: Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/ Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer

description.smallDes: Treat complexions to the replenishing powers of the CeraVe Cream to Foam Cleanser. Celebrated for its gentle approach to cleansing, this face wash helps to remove built-up dirt, grime and makeup without irritating the protective skin barrier.
description.largeDes: Suitable for normal to dry skin types, the luxurious formula boasts a rich, creamy texture that transforms into a luxurious foam. 3 Essential Ceramides harmonise to reinforce the surface barrier, restoring vital moisture to thirsty areas of skin. Amino Acids work to preserve complexions from environmental aggressors, supporting a hydrated, healthy-looking finish. Hero ingredient Hyaluronic Acid helps boost moisture and radiance, leaving the skin supple and smooth to the touch. Providing an effective but always gentle cleanse, this Cera Ve foaming cleanser captures lingering debris that may be dulling the skin’s surface, promoting clean, fresh and rejuvenated results.

howTo: Massage cleanser onto wet skin. Rinse well.

name: SPF 50+ Fragrance Free Face Sunscreen Lotion

description.smallDes: Enjoy a sun-soaked day the Bondi Sands way with this Daily Moisturising Face SPF 50+ Sunscreen Lotion. Providing UVA and UVB protection, the water resistant formula is gentle, fast absorbing and dries to an invisible finish. Formulated to deliver up to 72 hours of hydration, with added aloe vera and vitamin E to leave your skin feeling deeply moisturised. Can be worn alone or under makeup.
description.largeDes: Do not stay in the sun too long even while using a sunscreen product. Over exposure to the sun is a serious health threat. Keep babies and children out of direct sunlight. Always wear a hat, protective clothing and sunglasses. KEEP OUT OF SIGHT AND REACH OF CHILDREN. If swallowed seek medical attention immediately.  FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.  AVOID EYE CONTACT.  If the product enters the eye wash out thoroughly with plenty of clean water. Stop using this product if you develop redness or itching. Seek medical attention if irritation persists. Do not apply to damaged, inflamed or sensitive skin.

howTo: Shake well before use. Apply liberally and evenly to all unprotected areas 15 to 20 minutes before exposure to the sun. Reapply frequently, especially after swimming, exercise and towel drying.

name: Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant

description.smallDes: Fast absorbing liquid removes built-up dead skin cells and fights blackheads.
description.largeDes: Reveal flawless skin with our bestselling leave-on exfoliant. This gentle, lightweight fluid quickly exfoliates dead skin cells both on the surface and deep inside pores to reveal smoother, clearer, more radiant-looking skin. BHA (salicylic acid) has anti-inflammatory properties and helps to reduce blackheads, blemishes and redness.

howTo: Apply once or twice daily after cleansing and toning. Lightly soak a cotton pad and apply over the entire face, including the eye area (avoid the lower lash line and eyelids). Do not rinse. For daytime, follow with a moisturiser that contains a broad-spectrum sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater.

name: Juno Antioxidant + Superfood Face Oil

description.smallDes: Juno Antioxidant + Superfood Face Oil rejuvenates dull, lack-lustre complexions and delivers an intense radiance boost to leave skin looking luminous. With an exhaustive list of nourishing oils, it absorbs quickly to hydrate, whilst balancing sebum production for a healthy, dewy glow. Vitamin C, essential amino acids and omega-3, 6 and 9 together with natural UV shields and anti-inflammatory agents make this glorious oil-non-oil a potent, replenishing potion that restores tired skin to its velvety best.
description.largeDes: A unique, dry-oil blend, Sunday Riley's Juno Antioxidant + Superfood Face Oil promotes a radiant, lit-from-within glow. With a medley of lightweight, rapidly absorbed oils it works to nourish the skin & restore its vitality whatever your skin type - even oily. Cranberry and red raspberry seed oils provide natural UV protection, while pomegranate, blueberry and chardonnay grape seed oils are bursting with antioxidants to protect from free radicals. Argan Oil helps to improve elasticity and black cumin seed oil repairs and soothes.

howTo: Massage as many drops (usually 5-7) as needed into face, neck, and décolletage. Can be blended or layered with any face product.
